How many people are affected by osteogenesis imperfecta ?,"This condition affects an estimated 6 to 7 per 100,000 people worldwide. Types I and IV are the most common forms of osteogenesis imperfecta, affecting 4 to 5 per 100,000 people.",GHR,osteogenesis imperfecta
